memberdef.definition: const Eigen::SparseMatrix< double > & Ikarus::SparseFlatAssembler< FEC, DV >::matrix
memberdef.name: matrix

briefdescription.para: Calculates the matrix quantity requested by feRequirements and the affordance. For DBCOption::Full a zero is written on fixed degrees of freedom rows and columns, and a one is written on the diagonal. For DBCOption::Raw the untouched matrix is returned. For DBCOption::Reduced the matrix is reduced in size by removing the fixed degrees of freedom.

parameterdescription.para: Reference to the finite element requirements.

simplesect.para: Const reference to the modified sparse matrix quantity.

memberdef.definition: const Eigen::SparseMatrix< double > & Ikarus::SparseFlatAssembler< FEC, DV >::matrix
memberdef.name: matrix

briefdescription.para: Calculates the matrix quantity requested by the bound feRequirements and the affordance.

simplesect.para: const Eigen::SparseMatrix<double>& matrix(const FERequirement& feRequirements,MatrixAffordance affordance, DBCOption dbcOption)
Const reference to the modified sparse matrix quantity.

memberdef.definition: const Eigen::SparseMatrix< double > & Ikarus::SparseFlatAssembler< FEC, DV >::matrix
memberdef.name: matrix

briefdescription.para: Calculates the matrix quantity requested by the bound feRequirements, the affordance and the dBCOption.

simplesect.para: const Eigen::SparseMatrix<double>& matrix(const FERequirement& feRequirements,MatrixAffordance affordance, DBCOption dbcOption)
Const reference to the modified sparse matrix quantity.

briefdescription.para: Calculates the vectorial quantity requested by the feRequirements and the affordance. Depending on the requested DBCOption, the raw, reduced or full vector is returned. Raw means the degrees of freedom associated with dirichlet boundary conditions are not changed. Full means that degrees of freedom associated with dirichlet boundary conditions are set to zero in the vector. Reduced means that degrees of freedom associated with dirichlet boundary conditions are removed and the returned vector has reduced size.

parameterdescription.para: Reference to the finite element requirements.

simplesect.para: Const reference to the calculated vectorial quantity.

briefdescription.para: Calculates the vectorial quantity requested by the bound feRequirements and the affordance. Depending on the requested DBCOption, the raw, reduced or full vector is returned. Raw means the degrees of freedom associated with dirichlet boundary conditions are not changed. Full means that degrees of freedom associated with dirichlet boundary conditions are set to zero in the vector. Reduced means that degrees of freedom associated with dirichlet boundary conditions are removed and the returned vector has reduced size.

simplesect.para: Const reference to the calculated vectorial quantity.

briefdescription.para: Calculates the vectorial quantity requested by the bound feRequirements, the affordance and the dBCOption. Depending on the DBCOption, the raw, reduced or full vector is returned. Raw means the degrees of freedom associated with dirichlet boundary conditions are not changed. Full means that degrees of freedom associated with dirichlet boundary conditions are set to zero in the vector. Reduced means that degrees of freedom associated with dirichlet boundary conditions are removed and the returned vector has reduced size.

simplesect.para: Const reference to the calculated vectorial quantity.

briefdescription.para: Calculates the scalar quantity requested by feRequirements and affordance.

parameterdescription.para: Reference to the finite element requirements.

simplesect.para: Const reference to the calculated scalar quantity.

briefdescription.para: Calculates the scalar quantity requested by the bound feRequirements and returns a reference.

simplesect.para: Const reference to the calculated scalar quantity.

briefdescription.para: Returns the size of the free degrees of freedom, which are not fixed by a Dirichlet boundary condition.

simplesect.para: Size of the reduced degrees of freedom.

briefdescription.para: Returns the size of nodes, i.e., the number of degrees of freedom.

simplesect.para: Size of the degrees of freedom.

briefdescription.para: Creates the full-sized vector of size Dof and inserts the values of a reduced vector at the "free" degrees of freedom and writes a zero for the fixed doffs.

simplesect.para: Eigen::VectorXd The full-sized vector.

briefdescription.para: Returns the container of finite elements.

simplesect.para: Reference to the finite element container.

briefdescription.para: Returns the number of constraints below a given degrees of freedom index.

parameterdescription.para: Index of the degree of freedom.

simplesect.para: Number of constraints below the given index.

briefdescription.para: Returns true if a given degree of freedom is fixed by a Dirichlet boundary condition.

parameterdescription.para: Index of the degree of freedom.

simplesect.para: True if the degree of freedom is fixed; false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Coarse estimate of node connectivity, i.e., this relates to the bandwidth of a sparse matrix. This estimate overestimates the real connectivity and should only be used for allocating vectors.

simplesect.para: Size_t Coarse estimate of node connectivity.

briefdescription.para: Binds the assembler to a set of finite element requirement and affordance.

parameterdescription.para: Reference to the finite element requirement.

briefdescription.para: Binds the assembler to a finite element requirement.

parameterdescription.para: Reference to the finite element requirement.

briefdescription.para: Binds the assembler to an affordance collection.
Binds the assembler to an affordance collection.
Returns true if the assembler is bound to a finite element requirement and affordance.

simplesect.para: True if the assembler is bound; false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Returns true if the assembler is bound to a finite element requirement.

simplesect.para: True if the assembler is bound; false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Returns true if the assembler is bound to an affordance collection.

simplesect.para: True if the assembler is bound; false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Returns true if the assembler is bound to an affordance collection.

simplesect.para: True if the assembler is bound; false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Returns the requirement.
Returns the affordance.
Returns the dirichlet boundary condition enforcement option.

detaileddescription.para: Calculates the non-zero entries in the full sparse matrix and passes them to the underlying Eigen sparse matrix.
Calculates the non-zero entries in the sparse matrix and passes them to the underlying Eigen sparse matrix. The size of the matrix has the size of the free degrees of freedom.
Saves the degree of freedom indices of each element in the vector elementLinearIndices.
Saves the degree of freedom indices of each element in the vector elementLinearIndices but excludes fixed degrees of freedom.
Pre-processes the raw sparse matrix before assembly.
Pre-processes the reduced sparse matrix before assembly.

briefdescription.para: SparseFlatAssembler assembles matrix quantities using a flat basis Indexing strategy. The matrix is stored in a sparse matrix format. This format is exploited during the assembly process.

parameterdescription.para: Type of the finite element container.
